name: Brookie Fries (Cookie + Brownie Fries)
description: Cookie and Brownie Dough Shaped Like Fries
instructions: Make brownie dough: Melt butter and chocolate together until smooth
In a bowl whisk eggs, sugar, and vanilla until glossy
Add flour, cocoa powder, salt, and chocolate chips; mix until combined
Make cookie dough: In another bowl whisk egg, sugars, and vanilla
Add flour and salt and mix into dough; fold in chocolate chips
Assembly: Line a flat surface with parchment paper
Spread brownie dough into a rectangle
Cover with another parchment sheet and roll flat to about 1/2 inch thickness
Bake 12–15 minutes until edges are lightly golden and centers remain soft
